body.name: Pure Balance Cleansing Oil, Korean Skin Care Daily Face Wash, Makeup and Blackhead Remover, Plant-Powered with Clinically Proven Results - Ideal for Sensitive & All Skin Types 8.45 fl.oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: SEOUL DEEP CLEANSING OIL - Tired of products that consistently leave your skin feeling dry, dehydrated, and irritated? If so, we have the solution. Elevate your skincare routine with our Pure Balance Oil Cleanser Korean – a treat in every drop. This gentle facial cleanser penetrates deeply into pores, efficiently dissolving makeup, SPF and impurities without leaving a heavy or oily residue and clogging. Unveil clean, soft, and deeply hydrated skin.

BIOME BALANCING – Immerse yourself in our oil-based face cleanser, a synergistic blend with 83% plant-derived elements, including sunflower, sweet almond oil, apricot oil, and grapeseed oil. This distinctive combination is rich in vitamin E, antioxidants, and fatty acids, contributing to its nourishing qualities. Experience a naturally balanced and radiant complexion with this unique blend.

CLINICALLY PROVEN - Hypoallergenic and chemical-free, it doubles as a sunscreen, makeup remover, and effective acne treatment, visibly reducing excess sebum, blackheads, and whiteheads from the first use. Made without Parabens, Sulfates, Phthalates, Alcohol and Synthetic Dyes. 100% Vegan and Cruelty-Free. Enjoy the soothing feel of a dermatologist-approved, non-comedogenic formula ideal for all skin types including sensitive and oily skin.

THE ART OF USE - Embrace our Korean cleanser in your daily facewash ritual and indulge in the luxurious feeling of a skincare retreat at home. Gently massage the lightweight oil onto dry skin to effortlessly melt away makeup and impurities. Transform by emulsifying with water into a milky pore cleanser, then rinse to unveil a radiant, oil-free glow. Enhance Your Natural Beauty!

RETREAT KOREAN SKINCARE - Like all of our skin care products, this facial cleanser isn’t just a one-ingredient wonder. Our secret? Synergy. Rooted in Korean beauty tradition and infused with clinically proven innovations, our artful blends are crafted for your unique skincare journey. Join the RETREAT Kr family and transform your skincare routine into a retreat for your skin.
